titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Warren Weinstein should be returned home to his family.
Expressing the sense of Congress that Warren Weinstein should be returned home to his family.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Administration should: (1) use all lawful tools to bring Warren Weinstein, who was abducted in Pakistan in 2011 and currently held captive by al-Qaeda, home to his family; (2) make the return of all U.S. citizens held captive abroad a top priority; and (3) keep Congress apprised of its actions to achieve such goals.
